g.title: RCS_Tech_Tree
g.text: ★ Gold border = current project capability (L0, L1 maturity · FDTD solver · V1 validation)

g.title: L0
g.text: Unlock: Geometric reasoning + first-run field data

g.title: L1
g.text: Unlock: “Where is the return coming from?”

g.title: L2
g.text: Unlock: “How does it change with angle, frequency, polarization?”
Dedicated EM team | Shared compute cluster

g.title: L4
g.text: • Aero / structure vs. observability trade studies

g.title: L5
g.text: Unlock: “Automated exploration and optimization of aircraft observability.”
Major aerospace program | Formal EM discipline
